node.title: Faster Than the Speed Of Light- How Medical Missionary Work Can Encircle the Globe Quickly
node.description: World events tell us that virtually everything is set up for ushering in the second coming of Christ—except for one major prophecy that is unfulfilled. Find out what that prophecy is and why Christ won’t come until it is fulfilled. Learn why some mistakenly think that it will be almost impossible for this prophecy to be fulfilled in this generation. Find out why Christ has chosen His healing ministry to be the means of spreading His gospel to a hurting world in these last days, and how you can play a major role in being His healing voice, healing hands, and healing feet.
